friendsList.title: Friends
friendsList.addContactsDesc: Add contacts to PayCap so you can instantly send and recieve money wherever you are.

inviteFriend.title: Invite your friends
inviteFriend.description: Tell your friends about PayCap so you can instantly send and recieve money wherever you are.

authentication.confirmLogout: Are you sure that you want to log out?
authentication.confirmDeleteUser: Are you sure that you want delete your account?

errors.UsernameExistsException: An account with the given email already exists.
errors.User password cannot be reset in the cur: User password cannot be reset in the current state.
errors.Password reset required for the user: Password reset required for the user
errors.TextNotFoundException: The image provided does not seem to contain textual data.

username.description: Send money and manage your finances with PayCap

invalidAuth.somethingWrong: Something went wrong! Your sign in attempt failed with the following message:
invalidAuth.tfaCodeError: It looks like your Two Factor Authentication code was errorneous.

tfa.title: Please enter the code you just received on your phone or email

changePassword.title: Change your password
changePassword.explanation: It looks like you need to change your password. Please make sure your new password is at least 12 characters long and contains both uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers and symbols.
changePassword.validPassword: Uh oh! Please make sure your password is at least 12 characters long, and it has both uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers and symbols. This helps us better protect your account. :)

forgotPassword.title: Request a one-time password
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email address or phone number to request a new one-time password.

passwordSent.title: SMS sent!
passwordSent.description: We have sent a verification code by SMS. Please use the code to change your password.

enableTfa.title: Would you like to use Two Factor Authentication?
enableTfa.explanation: We can send you a one-time code to your account whenever you log into PayCap, so that it becomes more secure. We strongly adwise you to enable this feature - we're talking money after all!
enableTfa.explanationBottom: You can enable or disable TFA anytime from your Settings page.

general.rememberMe: Remember me, I'll be back later!
